DOC.brief_summary: Single arm study evaluate outcome treatment Barrel VRD device adjunctive treatment coil wide neck , intracranial , bifurcating/branching aneurysm middle cerebral basilar artery .

DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 18 85 year old . 2 . A wideneck de novo nonde novo aneurysm . 3 . Appropriate inform consent obtainable determine local IRB . 4 . Life expectancy > 24 month . 1 . Aneurysm rupture within 30 day enrollment . 2 . Bifurcating aneurysms treatable coiling . 3 . Subject platelet count < 70,000 . 4 . Subject known allergy nickeltitanium metal . 5 . Subject known allergy aspirin heparin . 6 . Subject lifethreatening allergy contrast ( unless treatment allergy tolerate ) . 7 . Subject currently participate another clinical research study . 8 . Subject pregnant breastfeeding . 9 . Subject participate drug study within last 30 day . 10 . Subject unable unwilling comply protocol requirement obtain required clinical evaluation followup .
